title: Barron’s Launches TV Show
text:
Weekend rituals are sacred. At Barron’s, we work extra hard to make sure that the valuable time you spend reading the analysis from our columnists and reporters on Saturday morning—and beyond—pays off.

The average reader of our magazine spends well in excess of an hour going through its pages, according to our research, and a growing number of you spend even more time reading our newsletters and Barrons.com, or listening to our podcasts—a deep commitment to quality content that makes the Barron’s community so special.

...
description: Weekly show features interviews with prominent figures and analysis by distinguished staff members. First interview is with Stephen A. Schwarzman of Blackstone.
